divs: Sighting Detailsafter i had my child i came down with the flu i called my mom to come and get my child when she took her so i can rest, i laid down on my couch closed my eyes for a minute opened them and this being was standing over me , the surroundings were unfamiliar i was not inmy home all i could see was white light and white walls .this being was slender almost annorexic.dark slanted oval eyes a very slender nose and a slender mouth .this being didn't talk verbally,it spoke with some sort of telepathy .it told me to go to sleep were not going to hurt you.after awhile i woke back up feeling well like i had no sickness at all.i think this being not only healed me i contain some sort of info i can't explain on paper i think it's some un charted star charts.please e-mail me back
Summary: very close/this being was in my home
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Davis
